jobs.title: IT Engineer
jobs.description: Identify with the practice at work the company’s core values of safety, integrity ethnics ownershipProvide support for the company PBX open source systems.Min. 4  years of relevant development experience and 1 year of technical team lead experience

hirer.name: Environmental Solutions (Asia) Pte Ltd
hirer.description:
REIMAGINING SUSTAINABILITY  Environmental Solutions (Asia) Pte Ltd (“ESA”) was incorporated in 1999. A company based on a strong belief in Sustainability – a company with an environmental and social purpose. ESA has been harvesting base and precious metals from spent resources from various industries (as an alternative to mining) and currently divert about 20,000MT of waste per year away from the landfills. ESA also harvests heat energy from 500MT a year of waste wood and electrical energy from the sun from our own 750KWp Solar PV roof, that certifies ESA as 130MTCO2 eq carbon negative. It is through the harvesting of spent resources in this circular economy, that we can truly look forward to a more sustainable future.

Since 2015, Environmental Solutions (Asia) Pte Ltd is an ISO14001 & ISO9001 certified company with the licence to handle and transport Toxic Industrial Waste by the National Environmental Council (NEA) Our current focus is spent auto catalytic converters, Spent Industrial Catalysts and other Metal Bearing Waste as raw materials.

Join us in Reimagining Sustainability.

WHY JOIN US?
We embrace 5 core values, ETHICS, INTEGRITY, SAFETY, OWNERSHIP AND FRUGALITY.
The tenets of our business philosophy and company policies. They shape our manner and approach in every way. Conspicuous in all our customer solutions.
Our people are our greatest resource. We value their well being and happiness in high regard. 
We encourage continual improvement and self-development. We also encourage happiness, optimism, diversity of thought, creativity, originality, and initiative.
We harness the full potential of  Our People, by creating a working environment that is stimulating, challenging, rewarding and safe for our people.

jobs.otherInformation:
IT Engineer
Responsibilities (Primary 80%):
  • Reporting to the Manager and Director of the Company
  • Identify with the practice at work the company’s core values of safety, integrity ethnics ownership
  • Provide in house programming and coding support for the company in web development, API development, e-commerce platform.
  • Perform system development for in-house web-based applications
  • Provide software integration support for the various departments and team of the company.
  • Creating websites using standard HTML/CSS practices
  • Working closely with the Marketing team to produce and implement contingency plans to the website
  • Procuring network equipment and managing subcontractors involved with network installation
  • Investigate faults in the network and report status to key stakeholders
  • Design and implement large scale information systems that fit into the organization application architecture
  • Maintain awareness of industry trends, emerging threats, and technologies to understand the risks and opportunities presented to the organization.
  • Focal point to all IT related vendors
Responsibilities (Secondary 20%):
  • Provide setup, troubleshooting and support for PC users, and the LAN in the office
  • Provide support for the company PBX open source systems.
  • Manage the IT backup system for the company
  • Documentation of IT system configuration, procedures and policies.
  • Other duties as assigned by the Manager/Director
Requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least a Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
  • Min. 4 years of relevant development experience and 1 year of technical team lead experience
  • Ability to manage multiple projects at the same time in a fast-paced environment.
  • Knowledge of Full Stack development will be an advantage

jobs.title: Technical Support Engineer

hirer.name: Fermax Asia Pacific Pte Ltd
hirer.description:
FERMAX – A world leading brand backed by 70 years of experience with a clear international vocation. Our products, capable of crossing cultural frontiers and responding efficiently to the needs of the most diverse users, are present in millions of homes around the world. We are a leading manufacturer of audio & video entry systems, access control systems and has been the market leader for intercommunication products in the building.

For entrances, we ensure excellent interior-exterior communication and that doors function properly using our door entry systems.
In the residences, monitors and telephones are an essential security element in the home for communication, surveillance and advanced management services.Be part of our FERMAX Family to bring about the quality of our products and committed service to the people.

jobs.otherInformation:
Job Scope:
· To provide second level of technical support for intercom / CCTV and access control systems.
· Support project and service team for the troubleshooting and solving of technical issues on site and off site.
· Assist project and service team for on-site equipment installation, testing and commissioning and attend site meeting as and when required.
· Prepare user manual and conduct training to client as and when required.
· Testing of new products and conduct internal product training to sales, service and maintenance team.
· Able to liaise and coordinate with manufacturers/suppliers pertaining to technical aspects and issues arising.
· Liaise with software development team for hardware integration to mobile application. App testing, validation combining with hardware and preparing of test reports.

Requirements:
· ITE/Diploma in Electronics/Electrical or IT related discipline.
· Experience in IP PBX system
· Min. 2 years’ experience in security line (CCTV / Intercom / Access Control).
· Service-oriented, passionate and responsible.
· Meticulous with strong problem solving and analytic skills.
· Able to interact well with clients, vendors and third parties
· Self-discipline and willing to work staggered hours when required
· Knowledge of TCP/IP, Network Structure, Firewall, LAN and VLAN.
· Knowledge in Microsoft Excel, Words and Office applications.

jobs.title: Engineer (React Native)
jobs.otherInformation:
Engineer (React Native - Mobile)
We want a react native engineer to help bring the product from idea to life.
What will you be doing
We are building a mobile app to help optimise the processes of frontline workers. We will be using React for the web platform and React Native for the mobile version.
Here are the experience and skill we’d love you to have
● Knowledge in HTML5, CSS3 / SASS
● Knowledge in React Native (Typescript)
● Has some experience / knowledge in Expo.io
● An understanding of Git and version controls
Bonus points
● An understanding of Firebase, NoSQL, Restful API and MEAN stack are a major plus ● You are actively involved in UX and engineering communities and trends ● You have personal pet projects you work on for fun in your free time
Your team and career
We are a fast moving startup, you will work directly with the CTO and CEO of the company. You will contribute to the product roadmap definition and work on the development of the product under agile scrum organization.
The challenges our company will face in the next 6 months are prioritised as followed, 1) Getting an MVP of the product ready 2) Developing new features 3) Creating a client mobile version

jobs.title: IDC/Data Center PM and Engineers Wanted in Singapore ASAP
jobs.otherInformation:
We are looking for a highly skilled Data Center Project Managers and Engineers to ensure that our data servers and network perform optimally. In this role, your duties will include installing and upgrading system components, as well as providing network support. You will also be required to perform maintenance and repairs on servers and network equipment.
To ensure success as a Data Center Engineer, you should exhibit extensive experience in ensuring optimal efficiency of data center infrastructure. Top-notch Data Center Engineers take proactive measures to prevent loss of data and damage to networks.
Data Center Engineers Responsibilities:
· Monitoring and performing on-going maintenance on servers and network equipment.
· Hands on experience with servers, hardware, networking
· Providing IT support to staff and customers, as well as responding to server and network issues.
· Protecting company data by preventing the overheating of data center components.
· Running hardware diagnostics and replacing failing parts in a timely manner.
· Monitoring all network processes to ensure the smooth flow of data across the network.
· Collaborating with software and network engineering teams on cybersecurity and network efficiency.
· Upgrading internal system components, including CPUs, memory, hard drives, and network cables.
· Documenting processes and keeping event logs.
· Advising on the procurement of new data center equipment.
· Keeping track of developing trends in data center technologies.
Data Center PM/Engineers Requirements:
· Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or similar.
· CompTIA ServerPlus, CompTIA Network, or CCNP certification would be advantageous.
· 2-3 years of experience as a Data Center Engineer, or similar.
· In-depth knowledge of Internet data center environments, servers, and network equipment.
· Extensive experience in installing, monitoring, and maintaining data center equipment.
· Exceptional ability to work as part of a team, provides IT support, and resolve errors.
· Ability to keep up with advancements in data center infrastructure and technologies.
· Proficiency in documenting network processes.
· Exceptional communication skills.
· Willingness to respond to network and server errors after hours.
· Additional requirement for IDC Project Manager, you must be able to speak and understand Chinese language
· For Engineers, be able to speak Mandarin

jobs.title: Full stack developer
jobs.description: We’re looking for a Full-Stack Developer to build new features, improve on the current code, and implement UX/UI designs.That’s exactly who we’re looking for at Crowd Genie. On top of that, you’re driven, analytical and a team player.

hirer.name: Crowd Genie Financial Services Pte. Ltd.
hirer.description: We are a peer-to-peer online lending platform that allows Singapore-based Small and Medium sized Enterprise (SMEs) to obtain financing from multiple investors. Being an intermediary platform, we match borrowers looking for debt financing with lenders looking for debt investments.Crowd Genie platform aims to fundamentally change the way companies and investors can access funds. Recent estimates suggest that even in a developed market like Singapore, almost 4 in 10 SMEs are without banking support, and fund raising remains very challenging for SMEs. Crowd Genie fills this gap in funding for companies that do not have access to traditional sources of financing.

jobs.otherInformation:
Full Stack Developer
The Opportunity
A.
  • You love building robust software on the back-end and front-end.
  • We’re looking for a Full-Stack Developer to build new features, improve on the current code, and implement UX/UI designs.
  • If you’re keen to strengthen your full-stack development skills, and work closely with our awesome team.
  • Looking for opportunity in Fintech!
B.
  • Solving problems and implementing solutions fascinate you.
  • That’s exactly who we’re looking for at Crowd Genie. On top of that, you’re driven, analytical and a team player.
  • If you are looking for a key role in a fast growing company, find out more about this opportunity below!
C.
  • We are looking for our next Full-Stack Developer to build out our platform. If you thrive in challenging and dynamic environments.
Your main tasks involve back end server management, front end development and MAS' Open Banking API integrations.
What You'll Learn
Strengthen your full-stack programming skills - You'll learn how to write clean code by adhering to our programming best practices and guidelines
- Improve on linking server-side logic with a better end-user experience
-  Build a user-friendly interface
- Hone your skills in front-end and back-end programming languages Develop your problem-solving skills and be a team player
- You’ll have the opportunity to solve challenging problems with the other developers in the team - Be exposed to Fintech API and open banking and KYC solutions

Job Description
Participate in entire application lifestyle - Build and expand on the robust and scalable software in React 2.0 and Firebase by building new features, debugging and optimizing the application - Write clean code to develop functional web applications on mobile and desktop - Review and implement UX/UI designs - Implementation of security and data protection - Design and implementation of data storage solutions - Develop and propose new products or features by monitoring the industry Requirements
Years of experience - 3-5 years of experience as a Full-stack developer Skills Required: - Bachelor degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience - Proficiency and experience in HTML, CSS and Javascript - Proficiency in Javascript frameworks like AngularJS, React - Knowledge of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery or Backbone.js - Strong knowledge and experience in back-end programming language - Familiarity with database engine such as MySQL, SQL, SERVER - Familiar with web hosting services such as Firebase - Experience in at least one CMS framework or web application framework What we’re looking for in you: - Desire to learn and adapt to new technologies - Able to work independently and effectively in a team - Strong attention to detail, analytical and love solving problems - Good verbal and written communication skills

hirer.name: Goalsmapper Pte Ltd
hirer.description: GoalsMapper™️ is the first fintech / insurtech company in Singapore with the vision to redefine financial planning, through its real-time, scenario-based and customer-facing financial planning software.GoalsMapper™️ leverage on smart technology to allow advisers to take in consumer’s financial information and present them in simple-to-understand and powerful charts. Because information, scenarios and recommendations are continuously computed in the background, consultants and consumers can focus their time on more effective discussions and better planning experience.Furthermore, the high detailed and accuracy of the GoalsMapper™️ charts allows consultants to assist clients to plan out multiple financial goals and multiple life scenarios to ensure that they are prepared for their financial future and make smarter financial decisions.GoalsMapper™️ is committed to the digitalization of the financial advisory industry. At the same time, we believe this is still a people-centric industry. By empowering the financial consultants with a powerful planning and client-facing solution, it increases their professionalism, value offering and credibility to the client.

hirer.name: BAO HE GROUP
hirer.description: Founded in 2005, the Bao He Group of companies have been a bedrock to foreign investors venturing into Singapore’s lucrative financial market for more than a decade. We believe in offering a one-stop service to our clients by implementing tailored solutions that include asset management, consulting and financial technology (fintech) among others. Located in Singapore’s SGX Tower, our experienced staff are able to provide the support you need, whenever you need it. Covering an assortment of fintech services, our subsidiaries - Bao He Immigration Specialist, Bao He Capital, Singapore Accounting Company, Qi Xiang Technology, Hao Ye Sheng Shi Solutions as well as JinHe Innovation work hand in hand with Shanghai Baoyu - our sister company based in Shanghai, China to help clients solve their business needs and identify the market opportunities they seek. As of 2017, the group has more than 300 employees worldwide and has collectively managed over $1 billion dollars’ worth of funds.About Qi Xiang Technology Pte Ltd --------------- Specialising in mobile applications development, Qi Xiang Technology envisions itself to be the future game changer in the F&B field. With the successful development of the food ordering app Xindots, Qi Xiang Technology has continuously outdone itself in order to become one of the leading mobile application developer in Singapore.      About Bao He Immigration Specialist Pte Ltd --------------Bao He Immigration Specialist has been in the Singapore’s immigration industry for over 13 years and is the leading brand in investment immigration and overseas life-planning services for individuals looking to migrate to Singapore. The company always adheres to the motto of “professionalism, integrity, excellence and efficiency”, providing Singaporean immigration consulting services to many clients as well as implementing tailor-made immigration programs to help high net-worth investors successfully immigrate to Singapore.About Hao Ye Sheng Shi Solutions Pte Ltd------------------Hao Ye Sheng Shi Solutions has been enhancing companies’ capabilities by providing assistance on customer relationship management by connecting them to their customers and streamlining their businessprocesses in order to improve their profitability. It also drives leads and improve customer loyalty, which ultimately leads to more successful deals in a shorter amount of time About JinHe Innovation Pte Ltd  --------------------           JinHe Innovation consists of a team of creative professionals that fulfills companies’ creative digital needs. From telling stories through unique angles on social media to engaging audiences by creating interactive websites and campaigns, JinHe Innovation’s biggest objective is to drive meaningful campaigns to impact audiences.About Bao He Capital  -------------------                                   Bao He Capital was founded with the goal of providing consultancy services to foreign investors who are interested in areas such as asset management, venture capital and financial consulting services. The company has provided value-added and professional services to help hundreds of clients set up their businesses in Singapore successfully.About Pipo  Pte. Ltd.  -------------------  PIPO Enterprise  is the latest unit to be a part of BaoHe Group. Incorporated in August 2018, it is working on developing PIPO, a revolutionary staffing app that will bring about a huge change in the manpower sourcing industry. PIPO will undergo massive progress in Singapore's market as it aims to innovate business social networking by growing individuals' branding and fostering paid interactions.

jobs.otherInformation:

  • Experience in using frameworks like Net Core/.Net for C#, Angular/React for Javascript, Symfony/Laravel for PHP and Django for Python
  • Experience in unit testing framework like xUnit, unittest, pytest, phptest
  • Experience working with Restful APIs especially connecting to payment gateway, social media, email, ecommerce
  • Experience in cloud based microservice architecture is desirable
  • Database (PostgresSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, NoSQL) & SQL experience
  • Experience in Linux and Windows environment
  • Good understanding of version control using GitHub, AWS Code Commit etc
  • Strong analytical, problem solving and decision making skills
  • Ability to stay on schedule and produce results in a timely manner
  • Fluent in English and good communication skills
Company URL: www.inctouch.com/‎
Interested applicants, please submit your resume and state your last drawn, expected salary and notice period. Vibrant working environment, walking distance from MRT station, Medical and dental service.
Applicants that need work pass need not apply, only shortlisted candidate will be notified.

jobs.title: Technology intern (Hacker)

jobs.otherInformation:
All-Star Team (Intern)
Kopi Date introduces a kinder way of meeting singles through 1:1 curated coffee dates at unique spaces in Singapore.
We're looking to build an all-star intern team by investing in hidden talents to run innovative projects across disciplines: Technology (Software Eng & Algorithms) | Growth (Marketing analysis & Content writing) | Experience Design (Design & Social Science)

Technology (Hacker Intern)
Work closely with the founders to strategise, iterate and develop both internal algorithmic tools and growth features.
Requirements:
  • Strong programming skills, with working experience in Javascript
  • Familiarity with Nodejs and other backend languages.
  • Interest and working knowledge in Machine Learning models is a plus.
  • Familiarity with Angular is a strong plus.
  • Strong ownership, relentlessly resourceful and independent in thinking, interest in working in a startup.
Join an exciting, mission driven local start-up as we enter the growth stage and brew thoughtful dating experiences to the Millennials!

KOPI DATE
HUMANISING CONNECTIONS

jobs.title: Android Developer | Onsite | Contractual
jobs.otherInformation:
Job Description
• Develop highly interactive, user-friendly Android applications
• Maintain and enhance existing mobile applications
• Translate functional requirements from users into sound technical designs that meet the objectives
• Design, develop and implement mobile applications in accordance with user requirements
• Prepare test plans and conduct SIT and UAT to ensure robustness and quality of applications
• Troubleshooting and debugging to optimize performance
• Involve in applications roll-out to respective app stores
• Stay up-to-date with new technology trends
• Undertake any ad-hoc duties assigned by superior
• Participate in full mobile application development lifecycle
• Deliver projects on time and ensure that it meets the business requirements
• Provide production support and ongoing maintenance and enhancement of mobile applications
• Able to work both independently as well as with a team on multiple projects

Requirements
• Minimum Diploma/ Degree in Information Technology or equivalent
• Proven software development experience in Android
• Senior level with more than 2 years related working experience and Junior level as fresh graduates are all welcomed
• Android developer candidates need to have solid understanding of Android development in Java/Kotlin
• Prefer developer with experience in cross platform mobile application development (e.g. ReactNative, Ionic)
• Familiar with common third-party libraries and APIs
• Experience in web service integration with apps (JSON, XML, SOAP, REST)
• Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
• Solid understanding of the full mobile development lifecycle, including publishing mobile apps on App stores/Google play
• Candidates with advanced working experience in development with Android SDK, Cocoa, Objective-C Frameworks, and tools will be in advanced consideration.
• Must be analytical, self-driven and proactive in keeping up with new technologies and programming languages
• Command of English
• Full time, 2-3 months contract
• Based in Singapore currently and willing to work onsite at client's place

jobs.title: Vue.JS Developer
jobs.otherInformation: Proficient with Vue.js framework and its core principles such as components, reactivity, and the virtual DOM. Familiarity with the Vue.js ecosystem, including Vue CLI, Vuex, Vue Router, and Nuxt.js. Good understanding of HTML5 and CSS3, including Sass or Less depending on your technology stack. Proficiency with modern development tools, like Babel, Webpack, and Git. Experience with both consuming and designing RESTful APIs.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: We’re looking for a Full-Stack Developer to build new features, improve on the current code, and implement UX/UI designs.That’s exactly who we’re looking for at SmartRx Pte Ltd. On top of that, you’re driven, analytical and a team player.
jobs.otherInformation:
The Opportunity
A.
  • You love building robust software on the back-end and front-end.
  • We’re looking for a Full-Stack Developer to build new features, improve on the current code, and implement UX/UI designs.
  • If you’re keen to strengthen your full-stack development skills, and work closely with our awesome team, read on!
B.
  • Solving problems and implementing solutions fascinate you.
  • That’s exactly who we’re looking for at SmartRx Pte Ltd. On top of that, you’re driven, analytical and a team player.
  • If you are looking for a key role in a fast growing company, find out more about this opportunity below!
C.
  • We are looking for our next Full-Stack Developer to join us in our mission to deliver world-class healthcare solutions using the coolest technologies. If you thrive in challenging and dynamic environments, and are hungry, creative and resourceful, read on as this is the opportunity you’re looking for.
Your main tasks involve programming and using your experience and expertise to contribute throughout the software engineering cycles across multiple projects. You’ll also work closely with other developers, designers and product managers to create a strong user experience.
What You'll Learn
Strengthen your full-stack programming skills - You'll learn how to write clean code by adhering to our programming best practices and guidelines - Improve on linking server-side logic with a better end-user experience - Build a user-friendly interface - Hone your skills in front-end and back-end programming languages Develop your problem-solving skills and be a team player - You’ll have the opportunity to solve challenging problems with the other developers in the team - As you’ll be collaborating closely with customers, designers, front-end developers and project managers to improve the user experience, you’d learn to be a better team player. Learn the latest industry trends and technologies - By working in our company, you’ll be exposed to the latest industry trends. - You’ll also get the opportunity to work with the latest technologies.
Job Description
Participate in the entire application lifestyle - Build robust and scalable software using Java, Spring Framework, Maven, GIT, MySQL by building new features, debugging and optimizing the application - Write clean codes to develop functional web applications on mobile and desktop - Review and implement UX/UI designs - Implementation of security and data protection - Design and implementation of data storage solutions Support internal improvements - Build reusable code and libraries for future use - Continuously improve your programming skills - Develop and propose new products or features by monitoring the industry Collaborate closely with internal teams colocated or remote - Collaborate with other developers and designers to build user-friendly interfaces, and integrate it with server-side logic. Extensive communication in the native language of remote teams are necessary e.g. with China's development team - Work closely with the designers, product managers, and system administrators to identify and build new features - Provide training and support to internal teams
Requirements
Years of experience - At least 1 year of experience as a Full-stack developer. Candidates with lesser experience but are able to demonstrate aptitute and the right attitude and drive will also be considered. Skills Required: - Bachelor degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience - Proficiency and experience in Java, HTML, CSS and Javascript - Proficiency in Javascript frameworks like AngularJS, React and Spring framework - Knowledge of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery or Backbone.js - Fundamental understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms such as LESS and SASS - Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX - Strong knowledge and experience in back-end programming language in Java and/or Python - Familiarity with database engine such as MySQL, PostgreQL, SQL Server - Experience with Linux/Unix and server management - Proficiency in code versioning tools such as Git - Familiar with web hosting services such as AWS, Azure, Tomcat - Knowledge of MVC architectures - Experience in at least one CMS framework or web application framework What we’re looking for in you: - Desire to learn and adapt to new technologies - Able to work independently and effectively in a team - Strong attention to detail, analytical and love solving problems - Good verbal and written communication skills - Ability to work in a fast-paced environment - Excellent time and project management skills
- Strong desire to make a difference in improving healthcare for all

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: Maintains and supports existing software products.Excellent knowledge and experience in web based application development.
jobs.otherInformation:
About Us:
We develop comprehensive software products and solutions ranging from IT consultancy to infrastructure and hardware setup to optimise customers' experiences. To establish ourselves as a leading provider of applications and healthcare support services for the Asian market, and partner healthcare customers to build a safe medical environment for all.
We are driven by our group philosophy as defined below: 1. Provide the best to our customers through a service-oriented culture 2. Create new value through innovation 3. Realise greater possibilities through advanced technology

Responsibilities:
  1. Develops and designs new software products.
  2. Maintains and supports existing software products.
  3. Performs technical edits of documentation.
  4. Maintains high quality standards while still developing software on schedule.
  5. Provides expertise on specific technical areas.
Qualifications:
  1. Diploma or Degree in Information Technology or related disciplines.
  2. Excellent knowledge and experience in web based application development.
  3. Excellent knowledge and experience in Microsoft.Net (ASP.Net and C#), Microsoft SQL, Crystal Reports.
  4. Familiarity with SQL Server Reporting Services is highly regarded.
  5. Experience reading and translating specifications and technical documents.
  6. Ability to meet multiple deadlines and adapt to changing priorities.
  7. Excellent written and spoken English is highly regarded.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: Collaborate with other teams to build high-performing applicationsRelated working experience in FE Developer or BE Developer
jobs.otherInformation:
Job Responsibilities:
  • Develop new user-facing features and implementing visual element
  • Collaborate with other teams to build high-performing applications
  • Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
  • Work on support and enhancements of applications when needed
  • Understanding of user experience design principles and translate into responsive UIs
  • Analyze and compile data, process and code to troubleshoot problems, and identify areas for improvement
  • Working with Project Manager, Project Coordinator, Front-end developers and other team members to complete objectives
  • Taking lead on projects if needed
  • Database design and implementation
  • Design cohesive codes to enhance the user experience
Requirements:
  • At least 2 year of frontend development experience with modern JS frontend framework (e.g. Angular, Vuejs and etc.)
  • Related working experience in FE Developer or BE Developer
  • Solid experience with HTML, CSS processors (SASS/SCSS) and UI framework (e.g. Bootstrap)
  • Able to take lead in finding solutions and be a self-starter who enjoys problem solving
  • Familiar with Agile and Scrum methodologies
  • Experience in design and backend development would be advantageous
  • Degree in computer programming, computer science
  • More education or experience may be required
  • Fluency or understanding of specific languages, such as C#, Java, NodeJS
  • Fluency or understanding of MYSQL or related databases
  • Strong time management skills
  • Strong problem solving, critical thinking and communication skills
  • Fluent in English
  • Limited working proficiency in Mandarin to liaise with Mandarin speaking clients and associates would be advantageous

jobs.title: React Native Developer (Remote)
jobs.description: Must have experience in deployed apps that uses bluetooth to connect to hardware devices via React NativeAt least 3 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.

hirer.name: Coconut Lab Pte Ltd
hirer.description: We help creative agencies, content marketing agencies, and businesses that lack technical expertise with their website needs. We help generate static and interactive websites from PSD, implement content management systems according to your creative designs, create prototypes to full fledge web applications for your startup's needs.

jobs.otherInformation:
Job Description
Develop mobile app using React Native for iOS and Android. Work together in small team with product manager, designer, team leader, backend developer in sprints to develop high quality mobile apps. Write automated test code to ensure mobile app works well. Manually tests app to ensure it works as intended.

Technical requirements
  • Proficient in React / React Native
  • Must have experience in deployed apps that uses bluetooth to connect to hardware devices via React Native
  • Experienced in Redux, aware of Redux Saga
  • Good in code management to code up reusable components, containers, services
  • Experienced in writing automated tests using suitable libraries, e.g. Jest, Enzyme, React Native testing library, Detox etc
  • Experienced in slicing design to front end layout
  • Proficient in using git
  • Able to lead a team

General Requirements
  • Required language(s): Bahasa Indonesia, English
  • At least 3 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s): React, JavaScript, React JS, React Native
  • Preferably Supervisor/Coordinator specialized in IT/Computer - Software or Equivalent.

hirer.name: Xtremax Pte Ltd
hirer.description: Xtremax Pte Ltd is an established, award-winning digital solutions agency.Since 2003, we have grown into a strong strategic business partner with various Singaporean government bodies, large organisations, MNCs, local businesses and educational institutions.Today, Xtremax is a large family network of over 300 professionals across the region, including Singapore (HQ), Bandung, Indonesia and Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.With a vast portfolio of creating top-notch digital applications and our commitment to interactive design, strategic content-planning, continual innovation, and leveraging the latest technology, we are committed in delivering excellence to our clients.

jobs.otherInformation:
Description
This is a good IT position for someone with programming experience and a real passion for technology.
As a Java Developer, you will be responsible for the development of web applications, assisting with new web-based developments, responding to issues and addressing general day-to-day programming issues.

Requirements

  • Knowledge in Java is required
  • Basic programming experience gained from a commercial role, your studies or similar
  • An understanding of HTML

hirer.name: Xtremax Pte Ltd
hirer.description: Xtremax Pte Ltd is an established, award-winning digital solutions agency.Since 2003, we have grown into a strong strategic business partner with various Singaporean government bodies, large organisations, MNCs, local businesses and educational institutions.Today, Xtremax is a large family network of over 300 professionals across the region, including Singapore (HQ), Bandung, Indonesia and Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.With a vast portfolio of creating top-notch digital applications and our commitment to interactive design, strategic content-planning, continual innovation, and leveraging the latest technology, we are committed in delivering excellence to our clients.

completed.otherInformation:
This job position is suitable for individuals who are constant learners, problem solvers and multi-taskers. Candidates who thrive in a fast-paced environment, steps up to face challenges, and are able to deliver results, are welcome to apply. We are looking for candidates who are interested in deployment, storage, backup, networking, and cloud solutions.
Responsibilities
  • Responsible for overseeing the company’s cloud computing strategy
  • Set up cloud storage and computing systems
  • Oversee application architecture and deployment in cloud environments
  • Ensure systems abide by local law and regulations, as well as security policies
  • Collaborate with engineers to come up with solutions to solve problems
Requirements
  • Good knowledge of at least one operating system: Linux, Unix, Solaris, Ubuntu, Windows
  • Good understanding of networking: TCP/IP addresses, HTTP, DNS
  • Good knowledge of programming or scripting language
  • Understands security concepts (e.g. firewalls) is necessary
  • Candidates with AWS, Google Cloud, MCSA/ MCSE certification are preferred
  • Good communication skills
